content: katex is fast easy-to-use javascript library for tex math rendering on web it can be enabled by adding katex true or math true front matter assuming youre using yaml format its also possible enable it globally configuring delimiters if you want configure delimiters just copy assets js katex-auto-render-options.js from theme folder your site folder keeping same path structure edit as you wish heres default configuration which means you can render expressions as inline elements by using $...$ or \\...\\ as delimiters like this \sqrt{\smashb{y}} while block elements can be rendered by using $$...$$ or \\...\\ like this $$ \displaystyle \left \sum_{k=1}^n a_k b_k \right^2 \leq \left \sum_{k=1}^n a_k^2 \right \left \sum_{k=1}^n b_k^2 \right $$ for more details about how configure delimiters see auto-render extension extensions extensions mhchem copy-tex are also included along necessary auto-render mhchem extension allows chemistry notation like \ce{h2o} or $$ \ce{x nanh4hpo4 -\delta napo3_x nh3 h2o} $$ while copy-tex allows users copy processed katex paste it its native format try copy formula above paste anywhere else about how load extensions heres quick example fences another tweak here is that katex blocks are accessible via keyboard long expressions can be scrolled $$ \text{damage} \text{skill level} \lfloor \lfloor \frac{h 0.7 \text{int} \text{int} \text{vit}}{\text{int} \text{vit}} \rfloor \rfloor $$ pretty much like code blocks

content: color your world is hugo theme developed around single experiment that led me this its html color picker along some vanilla js it allows anyone change what ill be calling here accent color color used mostly interactive elements liked result so much that decided use it on my main site but also want share it case anyone wants tinker it it makes heavy use of hugo pipes highly recommend using --minify when building ive been working on this theme for so long that there are features dont even remember anymore but here are some customizable dark light mode customizable accent color user-level keyboard-friendly privacy-aware extent no google analytics fonts disqus etc social shortcode including centralized decentralized platforms contact form shortcode via formspree open graph twitter cards structured data schema.org meta tags responsive images via image processing basic search functionality via fuse.js image lazy loading noscript capable extent except for katex search functionality screenshots requirements hugo extended minimum version 0.73.0 installation if you have git installed you can do following at cli within hugo directory for more information read hugo official setup guide customization dark light mode colors both color palettes can be found assets scss colors variables.scss accent color by default there are accent colors plus 10 on demo site distributed into pairs you can change default mode accent colors config fonts by default this theme uses oswald open sans fonts latin charset only woff2 format which is supported by most modern browsers if thats not enough for your use case youll have generate new set yourself fortunately its fairly easy thanks this tool google-webfonts-helper your project folder add font files folder named assets fonts css content file named assets scss fonts font-face.scss also make sure copy file assets scss fonts variables.scss into your project folder change font names accordingly syntax highlighting this theme comes two chroma styles meant be used dark light mode respectively these are monokai for dark mode solarized dark for light mode its worth noting that im not using original stylesheets but modified stylesheets based on pygments-high-contrast-stylesheets aka wcag aa passing pygments stylesheets case you want change it it can be found assets scss colors chroma as dark.scss light.scss lines below are required your config file make use of this feature disable it you can just remove noclasses null as its default value is true add lines below image processing by default images are responsive this is achieved through image processing where images are resized depending on their width for example images width equal or greater than 1280 pixels are processed resized into sizes 1280x 960x 640x if using hugo v0.83 or above set of webp files will be generated as well cover images will also be resized using fill method for open graph 1200x630 twitter cards 1280x640 you can change this behavior via config below you can find default params when using shortcodes img figure image processing can also be disabled by setting resize param as null shortcodes most complex shortcodes here are social contact-form they can be used inject list of social platform links contact form respectively social here make distinction between centralized decentralized platforms since decentralized platforms introduced concept of instances its not uncommon that single person owns multiple accounts multiple instances same platform this distinction should make setup easier heres example of config file this information will also be used generate social meta tags ie rel=me schema.org contact form miscellaneous rich content minimal effort put here since dont use this feature recommend that you create your own assets scss rich-content.scss 404 really basic 404 page can be generated via config file by using custom front matter params maintitle string can be used replace title meta tag if you wish it be different from h1 which will still use title param sitemapexclude true|null can be used exclude page section from sitemap noindex true|null similar above can be used exclude page section from being indexed by bots or your own site it will change meta tag robots noindex pages will not be added sites search index custom partials site title can be replaced by creating file named layouts partials custom site-title.html custom favicons can be used by creating file named layouts partials custom head-append.html custom css can be imported into main css file by creating file named static css custom.css or assets scss custom.scss footertext param can be replaced by creating file named layouts partials custom footer-text.html more params more possible params for your config file or front matter contributing translations are welcome just ask that font files are kept unmodified if latin charset isnt enough its up users choose which charsets they might need if you have any question or suggestion please feel free open issue acknowledgements font awesome fork awesome for icons @nickpunt @regpaq for dark light mode switcher idea glenn mccomb his article about custom pagination hugo jeffprod his article about building custom search engine for hugo many people on this forked gist for their takes on fuse.js hugo philip walton his sticky footer solution flexbox fuse.js katex @britonad for ukranian translation @moanos for german translation hugo its community sponsoring if this repo useful or helpful you any way please consider buying me coffee
